alert.note: Alert for Logan County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 4:46PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Logan, northwestern Phillips and Sedgwick Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 446 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Chappell to 4 miles southeast of Twin Buttes, or along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Julesburg to 22 miles southeast of Sidney. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Julesburg, Haxtun, Fleming, Ovid, Sedgwick, Crook, Paoli, Twin Buttes, Fairfield, Marks Butte and Sixteen-Mile Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
